content: Can I just close https://github.com/rust-lang/rfcs/pull/2600 (allow multiple attributes in a single #[]) due to lack of bandwidth on both my part and the lang team?
I think that one just got caught in some drive-by feedback and derailed.
If you wanted to revive it and you have time, I think it might work out. But if you don't have time, that's fine.
Personally I'd still like to see it.

I'd like to see it too, but I don't want to focus on it right now and I don't think anybody else does either. So if it was to go through FCP, it'd most likely end up in postpone. So I'm wondering if I should just close it as postponed without going through FCP or not.
Alright. If you don't want to do it right now, that's entirely fine. Yes, closing as postponed is fine.
I'm all in favour of cleaning up the backlog. I've closed it for now; we can always reactivate.
@isHavvy thanks for reaching out above it :)
